abilities.name: Scram
abilities.effect: If Brock's Primeape ever has exactly 10 HP left, shuffle it and all cards attached to it into your deck. This power stops working while Brock's Primeape is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Mega Thrash
attacks.effect: Brock's Primeape does 20 damage to itself. If there is a Stadium card in play, discard it.
